channel.title: Navan Badminton Club
channel.description: Welcome to Navan Badminton Club located at Claremont Stadium in Navan, Co. Meath, Ireland. Club nights every Monday and Wednesday during the season which runs from September to April. Club caters for Adults and Juveniles of all standards from beginner to advanced.

item.title: üè∏ Join Us at Claremont Stadium Tonight!
item.description: Join us at Claremont Stadium for a fun-filled evening of badminton. Open courts from 8pm to 11pm, with a special Juvenile Club Night starting at 6:30pm for ages 14+.
item.author: badminton@navanbadmintonclub.com (Navan Badminton Club)

item.title: Beginner Club Night at Claremont Stadium
item.description: Join us tonight from 9pm to 11pm at Claremont Stadium for Beginner Club Night. Whether you're new to badminton or need some practice, we'll have you rallying quickly. All 4 courts are open for a fun-filled evening!
item.author: badminton@navanbadmintonclub.com (Navan Badminton Club)

item.title: Wednesday Club Night at Claremont Stadium
item.description: Join us tonight from 8pm to 11pm at Claremont Stadium for Wednesday Club Night. Whether you're great at badminton or just starting, we‚Äôve got a court for you. Everyone‚Äôs welcome!
item.author: badminton@navanbadmintonclub.com (Navan Badminton Club)

item.title: Club Night
item.description: Join us tonight from 8pm to 11pm at Claremont Stadium. All skill levels are welcome; we have 4 courts ready for you!
item.author: badminton@navanbadmintonclub.com (Navan Badminton Club)
